title: Semantik Architect  Frame: Conflict / war event

main_event.description: Core event being described (war, battle, campaign, operation, etc.). Shape follows semantics.types.Event.

conflict_scope.description: Optional scope label such as 'global', 'regional', 'local', 'civil', etc.

belligerent_sides.description: Structured representation of the main sides in the conflict, typically two or more.

entities.description: Entities participating on this side (states, organizations, factions).

strength_estimate.description: Approximate strength figure (troops, forces, or similar). Use attributes for units or more detail.

casualties_estimate.description: Approximate casualties (killed, wounded, missing) for this side. Use attributes for breakdown.

notes.description: Optional free-form notes about this side (e.g. major allies, special circumstances).

commanders.description: Key commanders or leaders associated with the conflict, possibly annotated with side information.

person.description: Entity representing the commander or leader.

side_label.description: Optional reference to the side label this commander belongs to.

theatre_locations.description: Theatres or main locations where the conflict took place (countries, regions, specific localities).

overall_time_span.description: Overall time span of the conflict, typically covering the entire war or campaign. Shape follows semantics.types.TimeSpan.

key_phases.description: Optional list of major phases or campaigns within the conflict.

time_span.description: Approximate time span of the phase.

summary.description: Optional short semantic summary of what characterizes this phase.

outcome_lemma.description: Lemma-level label for the outcome, e.g. 'victory', 'defeat', 'indecisive', 'armistice', 'ceasefire'.

outcome_description.description: Optional short description of the outcome, including who prevailed and how.

treaties_or_settlements.description: Treaties, agreements, or settlements that ended or substantially changed the conflict.

total_casualties_estimate.description: Approximate total casualties across all sides. Use side-specific estimates in 'belligerent_sides' where available.

civilian_casualties_estimate.description: Approximate civilian casualties, if explicitly distinguished.

military_casualties_estimate.description: Approximate military casualties, if explicitly distinguished.

legacy_tags.description: Optional list of language-neutral tags summarizing legacy or significance, e.g. 'world_war', 'colonial_war', 'independence_war'.

attributes.description: Free-form attribute bag for additional, lightly structured information not yet promoted to first-class fields (e.g. economic impact, territorial changes).

extra.description: Reserved for pipeline- or source-specific metadata that should not affect generation but may be useful for debugging or analysis.

conflict_type.description: Legacy field: coarse type label for the conflict (e.g. 'war', 'battle', 'operation'). Prefer 'conflict_kind' for new data.

belligerents.description: Legacy field: flat list of participating belligerents. Prefer 'belligerent_sides' for structured side data.

locations.description: Legacy field: list of locations for the conflict. Prefer 'theatre_locations'.

start_time.description: Legacy field: start time of the conflict. Prefer 'overall_time_span'.

end_time.description: Legacy field: end time of the conflict. Prefer 'overall_time_span'.
